channel.title: Medical Image on 张嘉铭
channel.description: Recent content in Medical Image on 张嘉铭

item.title: SAMME: Segment Any Medical Model Extended
item.description: I’m excited to announce that our project SAMM has received many attentions from all over the world! Please reach out if you want to collaborate. SAMM allows users to directly leverage the powerful Segment Anything Model (SAM) to segment medical images (including CT, MR, Ultrasound, and more) in 3D Slicer.

item.title: XREGI: Learning-based 2D/3D Fluoroscopic Image Registration
item.description:
Learning-based 2D/3D Fluoroscopic Image Registration Link to heading

We developed and maintained an open-source python package xregi that is used to compute the projection matrix between 2D x-ray images and 3D CT scans. This process is also called as 2D/3D fluoroscopic image registration problem. The package is now available on Pypi. Install the pacakge through pip install xregi to try out!
